titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> (April 20) = "Flock"? <*> (June 23) = no idea, parenthetical comment s5: <*> address = "quaie"? s7: Shakespeare and Co. postcard with notes on it s8: Blank back of postcard
